column4: It's really difficult to get something that replaces it in all circumstances and gives you really compatible docs
I've been working with various 'smart ASCII' tools for awhile (currently 'txt2tags')...
Nod yeh I know lots of people who use stuff like that; although these days HTML is almost the best way
I've been cranking out .html format, then either dumping to Wyrd when necessary, or trying to convert to PDF - stuff like that
